DERBY-649 Fix regression in original patch. Push relational predicates into UNION.
Original patch re-applied with: svn merge -r 357104:357105 https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/code/branches/10.1 svn merge -r 357054:357055 https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/code/branches/10.1
Then additional changes to ensure a relational operator of the correct type in PredicateList and additional testing in predicatesIntoViews.sql.
